meanings.definition: Having or causing an irritating sensation on the skin that makes you want to scratch.
meanings.sent1: The wool sweater felt itchier than the soft cotton one.
meanings.sent2: My bug bites always get itchier after I scratch them.
meanings.sent3: The label on my shirt seemed to become itchier as the day went on.
meanings.sent4: The thought of failure was like an itchier version of anxiety.
meanings.sent5: The sound of nails on a chalkboard was as itchier as a mosquito bite.

meanings.sent1: The new detergent was itchier on my skin than the old one.
meanings.sent2: The prickly heat rash was getting itchier by the minute.
meanings.sent3: The cat's fur felt itchier than usual after rolling in the grass.
meanings.sent4: The suspense in the movie was itchier than waiting for test results.
meanings.sent5: The tension in the room was as itchier as a wool sweater on a hot day.
